I’m about as attracted to actual children as someone who thinks all lolicons should die in a fire would be. They’re just completely different entities to me. I don’t like it if it gets too rapey, and it always makes me uncomfortable when they talk about the specific age and the fact that it’s illegal, but personally I don’t find it inherently problematic to like this stuff because I know that it doesn’t translate to real life in any way for me. And I’m not proud of it—I would never talk about it anywhere other than a hentai site, but I just wanted to express my thoughts on this because it’s really complicated. And yeah I saw someone making fun of people writing a paragraph to justify it, but I have strong feelings on this and wanted to get them off my chest
I feel personally ok with this because I’m only attracted to it when it’s purely fictional, but what worries me is that there are people who would want this to be real...
I’m always a bit iffy about this stuff, but I know it’s not real, and I don’t want it to be real, so I think it’s... mostly ok
